mapper.select: select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, name from ( select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, docu_code from documents where status = #{status} and emp_no = #{empNo} order by write_date desc ) d join document_list dl ON d.docu_code = dl.docu_code where ROWNUM <= 5

choose.when: insert into documents values (document_seq.nextval, #{emp_no}, #{title}, sysdate, null, #{status}, #{emer_yn}, #{docu_code})
choose.otherwise: insert into documents values (document_seq.nextval, #{emp_no}, #{title}, sysdate, null, #{status}, 'N', #{docu_code})

mapper.insert: insert into approvals_line values (a_line_seq.nextval, #{document_seq}, #{emp_no}, null, #{status}, #{approval_order}, null)
mapper.select: select a.*, name, role_title from approvals_line a join employee e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no join role r on e.role_code = r.role_code where document_seq = ${docuSeq} order by a.approval_order

select d.document_seq document_seq, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, d.emp_no emp_no, a.emp_no last_appr from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where
d.docu_code = #{docuCode} and
d.status = '진행중' and approval_order = 3 and d.document_seq in (select document_seq from approvals_line where emp_no = #{empNo} and status = #{status})

select d.document_seq document_seq, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, d.status status, a.emp_no last_appr, done_date from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where a.approval_order = 3 and d.status in ('진행중', '완료', '반려') and d.emp_no = #{empNo}
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}

select document_seq, write_date, name, emer_yn, title from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code where status = '임시 저장' and emp_no = #{empNo}
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}

select d.document_seq document_seq, d.emp_no emp_no, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, d.status status, done_date from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where a.emp_no = #{empNo} and a.status = '결재 완료' and d.status = '완료'
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}

select d.document_seq document_seq, d.emp_no emp_no, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, done_date from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join approvals_line a on d.document_seq = a.document_seq where a.emp_no = #{empNo} and a.status = '결재 완료' and d.status = '반려'
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}

select d.document_seq document_seq, d.emp_no emp_no, write_date, name, emer_yn, title, d.status status, done_date from documents d join document_list dl on d.docu_code = dl.docu_code join reference_line r on d.document_seq = r.document_seq where r.emp_no = #{empNo}
and d.docu_code = #{docuCode}
